trans-unit.source: Defines the reader, writer, and methods for pre-generated, typed serializers.
trans-unit.target: 為預先產生且具類型的序列化程式定義讀取器、寫入器和方法。

trans-unit.source: To improve the performance of XML serialization, you can generate assemblies before serialization using the [XML Serializer Generator Tool (Sgen.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-serializer-generator-tool-sgen-exe.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要改善效能的 XML 序列化，您可以產生組件之前使用序列化[XML 序列化程式產生器工具 (Sgen.exe)](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-serializer-generator-tool-sgen-exe.md)。

trans-unit.source: When such an assembly is loaded, the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> uses the properties of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerImplementation> interface to query the contained serializer or serializers.
trans-unit.target: 當這類組件已載入，<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer>使用的內容<xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerImplementation>查詢包含的序列化程式或序列化程式的介面。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerImplementation" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializerImplementation" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that determines whether a type can be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 取得可判斷某個類型是否能序列化的值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the type can be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果類型可以序列化，即為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a serializer for the specified type.
trans-unit.target: 傳回指定類型的序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: An instance of a type derived from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer" /> 類別的類型執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML reader object that is used by the serializer.
trans-unit.target: 取得序列化程式所使用的 XML 讀取器物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader" /> that is used to read an XML document or data stream.
trans-unit.target: 用來讀取 XML 文件或資料流的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of methods that is used to read a data stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來讀取資料流的方法集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" /> that contains the methods.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />，其中包含方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of typed serializers that is found in the assembly.
trans-unit.target: 取得具類型序列化程式的集合，此集合可在組件中找到。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" /> that contains the typed serializers.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />，其中包含具型別序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: Get the collection of methods that is used to write to a data stream.
trans-unit.target: 取得用來寫入資料流的方法集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" /> that contains the methods.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Hashtable" />，其中包含方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XML writer object for the serializer.
trans-unit.target: 取得序列化程式的 XML 寫入器物件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter" /> that is used to write to an XML data stream or document.
trans-unit.target: 用來寫入 XML 資料流或文件的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationWriter" />。
